booking_closed_tooltip: Registration is currently closed by the administration.
footer_copyright: Al-Ibaanah Arabic Center | Nasr City, Cairo
hero_subtitle: Welcome to the Al-Ibaanah IntakeFlow. Secure your mandatory placement assessment slot and streamline your arrival at our Cairo campus.
features_subtitle: We've modernized our arrival process to ensure your first day at Al-Ibaanah is smooth and efficient.
feature_1_text: Select a specific time slot for your on-campus evaluation. No more waiting in long queues.
feature_2_text: Receive a digital registration code and slip immediately after booking your assessment.
feature_3_text: Our front desk uses QR/Code scanning for a 10-second check-in experience upon arrival.
faq_1_q: Do I need to register on the main site first?
faq_1_a: Yes. Please ensure you have read the program requirements at ibaanah.com. This portal is specifically for booking your required in-person placement assessment.
faq_2_a: You will have a 15-minute interview with an instructor to determine your speaking, reading, and writing proficiency.
faq_3_a: Slots are limited. If you cannot attend, please contact the front desk at least 24 hours in advance.
visit_subtitle: Assessment and enrollment happen on-site at our Nasr City headquarters. Please ensure you have your digital intake slip ready on your phone upon arrival.
reg_closed_subtitle: The administration has temporarily paused online bookings. Please check back later or contact the front desk for more information.
form_step2_subtitle: Please select an available appointment time for your on-campus evaluation.
review_disclaimer: By confirming, you agree to visit the campus on the selected date with the required documentation for the assessment.
campus_address_l1: Al-Ibaanah Arabic Centre, Nasr City Branch
campus_address_l2: Evaluation Dept, Ground Floor, Zone A
checklist_3: Proof of initial registration from ibaanah.com
checklist_5: A printout or digital copy of your Intake Slip
slip_footer: This document is generated by Al-Ibaanah IntakeFlow. Authenticity can be verified at the Front Desk.
